DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study was to see whether a brief intervention given in adolescence has an effect on smoking in adulthood. The investigators also wanted to clarify the significance of some known psychosocial risk factors of smoking in adulthood.
DOC.brief_title: Adult Follow-up of Preventive Study With Brief Smoking Intervention for Adolescents
DOC.criteria: Born on 1979. Living in Vaasa, Pietarsaari, Kokkola or Sein√§joki at school age. Other year of birth.
